topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee61ef6368727138da1100#post_54ee61ef6368727138da1100
The funny thing is that they just grabbed whatever, no matter what company made it, making it nearly impossible to get the rights to recreate some of the older toys. Plus one toys was a rebranded Marcoss robot so when Marcoss was brought over here, their toyline was turned into (of all things) a line of fashion dolls. Because they hasbro had the rights to recreate the robots, they couldn't make them themselves.
